name: go-native
description: ![version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-0.1.0-green.svg)    Javascript polyfills which let you use native javascript.    [CSS3 selectors](https://www.w3.org/TR/css3-selectors/), [CSS3 media queries](https://www.w3.org/TR/css3-mediaqueries/), ES5 extensions and a bunch of DOM utilities.   Tested on *IE 8+, Firefox 17+, Chrome 15+, Safari 4+, Opera 10+*.
